pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tests for Error Autocorrelation, ARCH Errors, and Cointegration in Vector Autoregressive Models // Implements the Wild bootstrap tests for autocorrelation in vector autoregressive models of Ahlgren, N. Catani, P. (2016, doi:10.1007/s00362-016-0744-0), the Combined LM test for ARCH in VAR models of Catani, P. Ahlgren, N. (2016, doi:10.1016/j.ecosta.2016.10.006), and Bootstrap determination of the co-integration rank (Cavaliere, G., Rahbek, A., Taylor, A. M. R., 2012, 2014).
